Bat Claw.name: Bat Claw
Bat Claw.description: In a quick flash of movement you catch a glance of the claws that this creature wields. They're a rotten yellow colour, and although they look blunt, you get the feeling that with enough force you could be hurt quite a lot.

success_action_phrases: The claws glide into your arm, staggering you for a second.
failure_action_phrases: The claws swish past you in a sound of what you'd imagine 'luck' is like.

Bat Teeth.name: Bat Teeth
Bat Teeth.description: You manage to catch a small sight of the small sharp teeth.

success_action_phrases: The teeth fall into your arm, staggering you for a second.
failure_action_phrases: You manage to duck out of the way of the teeth.

Bat Recover.name: Bat Recover
Bat Recover.description: The bat lingers for a second, retreating, presumably to recover.

success_action_phrases: After a few seconds, the bat glides back toward you with newfound strength.
failure_action_phrases: The bat glides back to you before, but you can see it hasn't recovered.
